Key Match Events: Terance Mann made a crucial block on a shot by Immanuel Quickley to maintain the Clippers' lead
Norman Powell made a free throw to retake the lead for the Clippers
James Harden was fouled but made only one free throw
Jakob Poeltl intentionally missed his second free throw, and Ivica Zubac corralled the rebound with 2.5 seconds left
Pre-Game Insights: Clippers coach Tyronn Lue acknowledged that his team was tired but emphasized the importance of winning the game
James Harden mentioned that the team had a tough schedule but was making good money to play the game they love
Post-Match Reflections: Tyronn Lue expressed relief that the Clippers were able to win despite their fatigue
Norman Powell acknowledged that he was tired but managed to stay focused and find a way to contribute to the team's win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers have played four games in six days and three sets of back-to-backs this season
Kawhi Leonard is still out with inflammation in his right knee and will not travel with the team on their upcoming trip
Others: Mo Bamba is progressing in his recovery from a knee injury but his status for the upcoming trip is uncertain
